noteText: Remember to submit the quarterly report by Friday afternoon. Double-check all financials before sending.
Call Jamie about the camera installation in Sector 3. Get confirmation on coverage zones.
Buy snacks for the office fridge: sparkling water, fruit, and granola bars.
Team standup moved to 10am tomorrow. Don’t forget to update the calendar invite.
Sketch out wireframe ideas for the alert configuration panel. Prioritize clarity over options.
Book a conference room for the demo walkthrough on Wednesday morning.
Investigate login errors from overseas users. Possibly a time zone offset issue.
Water the office plants before the weekend. Snake plant near the front is looking dry.
Update your GitHub bio with the new component library link and recent work on Svaria.
Check in with legal about the updated terms of use—need approval before launch.
